Player History
Earned first career win on 4/28/1985...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/4/1986 to a 4-year deal worth $10,000,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1986, off Bob Patterson (SD)...
Pitched NO-HITTER against St. Louis on 5/13/1986, striking out 12...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/31/1986 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/1987, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1987, going 5-1, 0.77...
Injured on 8/28/1987 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1988, going 3-1, 1.02...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Hit first career homerun on 5/18/1989, off Mike Scott (PIT)...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/5/1989 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 8-9 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1989, going 5-0, 0.94...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/1989, winning 2 games with a 0.55 ERA...
10/6/1989: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $13,500,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/1990, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 1990...
Injured on 4/4/1991 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 7 weeks...
